title: CAR MODEL detail page Â» CAR MODEL VARIANTS
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see all VARIANTS of a CAR MODEL\
So I can can get an idea about the range of available versions
description:
* The CAR MODEL detail page contains a section with a list of all connected CAR MODEL VARIANTS.
* Each CAR MODEL VARIANT in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each CAR MODEL VARIANT in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each CAR MODEL VARIANT in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no CAR MODEL VARIANT connected to the CAR MODEL then the section is not displayed at all.
